resp = client.search(
    index="my-index-*",
    query={
        "bool": {
            "must": [
                {
                    "match": {
                        "user.id": "kimchy"
                    }
                }
            ],
            "must_not": [
                {
                    "terms": {
                        "_index": [
                            "my-index-01"
                        ]
                    }
                }
            ]
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
